AssociateCustomDomain.name: AssociateCustomDomain
AssociateCustomDomain.description: Grants permission to associate your own domain name with the AWS App Runner subdomain URL of your App Runner service

AssociateWebAcl.name: AssociateWebAcl
AssociateWebAcl.description: Grants permission to associate the service with an AWS WAF web ACL

CreateAutoScalingConfiguration.name: CreateAutoScalingConfiguration
CreateAutoScalingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create an AWS App Runner automatic scaling configuration resource

CreateConnection.name: CreateConnection
CreateConnection.description: Grants permission to create an AWS App Runner connection resource

CreateObservabilityConfiguration.name: CreateObservabilityConfiguration
CreateObservabilityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create an AWS App Runner observability configuration resource

CreateService.name: CreateService
CreateService.description: Grants permission to create an AWS App Runner service resource

CreateVpcConnector.name: CreateVpcConnector
CreateVpcConnector.description: Grants permission to create an AWS App Runner VPC connector resource

CreateVpcIngressConnection.name: CreateVpcIngressConnection
CreateVpcIngressConnection.description: Grants permission to create an AWS App Runner VpcIngressConnection resource

DeleteAutoScalingConfiguration.name: DeleteAutoScalingConfiguration
DeleteAutoScalingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS App Runner automatic scaling configuration resource

DeleteConnection.name: DeleteConnection
DeleteConnection.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS App Runner connection resource

DeleteObservabilityConfiguration.name: DeleteObservabilityConfiguration
DeleteObservabilityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS App Runner observability configuration resource

DeleteService.name: DeleteService
DeleteService.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS App Runner service resource

DeleteVpcConnector.name: DeleteVpcConnector
DeleteVpcConnector.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS App Runner VPC connector resource

DeleteVpcIngressConnection.name: DeleteVpcIngressConnection
DeleteVpcIngressConnection.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS App Runner VpcIngressConnection resource

DescribeAutoScalingConfiguration.name: DescribeAutoScalingConfiguration
DescribeAutoScalingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve the description of an AWS App Runner automatic scaling configuration resource

DescribeCustomDomains.name: DescribeCustomDomains
DescribeCustomDomains.description: Grants permission to retrieve descriptions of custom domain names associated with an AWS App Runner service

DescribeObservabilityConfiguration.name: DescribeObservabilityConfiguration
DescribeObservabilityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve the description of an AWS App Runner observability configuration resource

DescribeOperation.name: DescribeOperation
DescribeOperation.description: Grants permission to retrieve the description of an operation that occurred on an AWS App Runner service

DescribeService.name: DescribeService
DescribeService.description: Grants permission to retrieve the description of an AWS App Runner service resource

DescribeVpcConnector.name: DescribeVpcConnector
DescribeVpcConnector.description: Grants permission to retrieve the description of an AWS App Runner VPC connector resource

DescribeVpcIngressConnection.name: DescribeVpcIngressConnection
DescribeVpcIngressConnection.description: Grants permission to retrieve the description of an AWS App Runner VpcIngressConnection resource

DescribeWebAclForService.name: DescribeWebAclForService
DescribeWebAclForService.description: Grants permission to get the AWS WAF web ACL that is associated with an AWS App Runner service

DisassociateCustomDomain.name: DisassociateCustomDomain
DisassociateCustomDomain.description: Grants permission to disassociate a custom domain name from an AWS App Runner service

DisassociateWebAcl.name: DisassociateWebAcl
DisassociateWebAcl.description: Grants permission to disassociate the service with an AWS WAF web ACL

ListAssociatedServicesForWebAcl.name: ListAssociatedServicesForWebAcl
ListAssociatedServicesForWebAcl.description: Grants permission to list the services that are associated with an AWS WAF web ACL

ListAutoScalingConfigurations.name: ListAutoScalingConfigurations
ListAutoScalingConfigurations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS App Runner automatic scaling configurations in your AWS account

ListConnections.name: ListConnections
ListConnections.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS App Runner connections in your AWS account

ListObservabilityConfigurations.name: ListObservabilityConfigurations
ListObservabilityConfigurations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS App Runner observability configurations in your AWS account

ListOperations.name: ListOperations
ListOperations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of operations that occurred on an AWS App Runner service resource

ListServices.name: ListServices
ListServices.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of running AWS App Runner services in your AWS account

ListServicesForAutoScalingConfiguration.name: ListServicesForAutoScalingConfiguration
ListServicesForAutoScalingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of associated AppRunner services of an AWS App Runner automatic scaling configuration in your AWS account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags associated with an AWS App Runner resource

ListVpcConnectors.name: ListVpcConnectors
ListVpcConnectors.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS App Runner VPC connectors in your AWS account

ListVpcIngressConnections.name: ListVpcIngressConnections
ListVpcIngressConnections.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of AWS App Runner VpcIngressConnections in your AWS account

PauseService.name: PauseService
PauseService.description: Grants permission to pause an active AWS App Runner service

ResumeService.name: ResumeService
ResumeService.description: Grants permission to resume an active AWS App Runner service

StartDeployment.name: StartDeployment
StartDeployment.description: Grants permission to initiate a manual deployemnt to an AWS App Runner service

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to, or update tag values of, an AWS App Runner resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an AWS App Runner resource

UpdateDefaultAutoScalingConfiguration.name: UpdateDefaultAutoScalingConfiguration
UpdateDefaultAutoScalingConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update an AWS App Runner automatic scaling configuration to be the default in your AWS account

UpdateService.name: UpdateService
UpdateService.description: Grants permission to update an AWS App Runner service resource

UpdateVpcIngressConnection.name: UpdateVpcIngressConnection
UpdateVpcIngressConnection.description: Grants permission to update an AWS App Runner VpcIngressConnection resource
